skills_2.name: Web Development
skills_2.desc: Craft engaging and interactive web experiences, turning high-fidelity designs into functional prototypes.

skills_2.name: Back-end Development
skills_2.desc: Build the core of applications, handling server-side logic and databases to ensure seamless functionality.

skills_2.name: Git Version Control
skills_2.desc: Efficiently manage codebase changes, collaborate seamlessly with teams, and track project progress using Git.

skills_2.name: App Design
skills_2.desc: Design visually appealing and user-friendly app interfaces that enhance user experiences.

skills_2.name: Database
skills_2.desc: Design, implement, and manage databases to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval.

skills_2.name: Teamwork
skills_2.desc: Collaborate effectively within teams, leveraging diverse skills to achieve project goals cohesively.

passions.name: Design
passions.description: I take pleasure in creating visually appealing and functional solutions. My creativity knows no bounds, and I find inspiration in everything around me.

passions.name: Technology
passions.description: I have a deep passion for technology, constantly exploring the latest advancements in the field. From coding to hardware, I strive to stay up-to-date and experiment with new tools and techniques. The limitless possibilities motivate and excite me to keep pushing my boundaries in my work.

passions.name: Sport
passions.description: I have a deep passion for the gym as it allows me to not only stay physically fit, but also provides an outlet for mental clarity and stress relief. Each workout presents a new challenge, and the sense of accomplishment afterwards is truly rewarding.
